jobs_results.title: Blockchain Analyst

job_highlights.title: Qualifications
items: Advanced proficiency in blockchain-based investigations, with a minimum of 2 years of relevant experience;
Nuanced understanding of blockchain technology;
In-depth knowledge of BSA/AML regulations;
Experience conducting complex investigations that involve multiple sources of data;
Advanced written and verbal communication skills;
Good time management skills;
Ability to work well under pressure and to manage multiple tasks simultaneously

job_highlights.title: Responsibilities
items: The Blockchain Analyst assists with various assignments supporting the Compliance Program of the Company
Conduct complex investigations into cases that are referred as part of the overall escalation process;
Conduct proactive blockchain-based investigations;
Produce briefs and reports on a range of issues:
Synthesize data derived from other sources into long-form analysis;
Provide training and support to other analysts on the U.S. Financial Crimes Team;
Maintain proficiency in all aspects of BSA/AML compliance;
Attend BSA training as assigned by the Compliance Officer

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Developer for NFT Website Development
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for a skilled and experienced blockchain developer to develop a NFT website. The project involves designing, developing and deploying a website for buying and selling NFTs using blockchain technology.

You would be doing following...

Design and develop a NFT website using blockchain technology

Implement smart contracts and integrate with various blockchain networks

Develop a user-friendly interface for buying and selling NFTs

Implement secure payment and transaction processes

Ensure the website is scalable and can handle large volumes of traffic

Requirements:

Strong experience in blockchain technology, particularly in developing NFT websites

Experience in implementing smart contracts and integrating with blockchain networks such as Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain

Proficient in programming languages such as Solidity, JavaScript, and Python

Knowledge of web3.js and Truffle framework

Understanding of security protocols and measures for blockchain technology

Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently

job_highlights.title: Qualifications
items: Strong experience in blockchain technology, particularly in developing NFT websites
Experience in implementing smart contracts and integrating with blockchain networks such as Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain
Proficient in programming languages such as Solidity, JavaScript, and Python
Knowledge of web3.js and Truffle framework
Understanding of security protocols and measures for blockchain technology
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently

job_highlights.title: Responsibilities

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Technology Instructor
jobs_results.via: via Higher Education Recruitment Consortium (HERC), HERC Jobs
jobs_results.description:
Blockchain Technology Instructor
University of California Los Angeles
...
Requisition Number: JPF08290

UCLA Extension is considered one of the top institutions of its kind, offering to more than 35,000 students per year approximately 4,500 classes and non-degree certificate programs to meet the professional development, continuing education and personal enrichment needs of the full spectrum of nontraditional students as well as companies and organizations throughout and beyond the Los Angeles region.
Course / Program Description

The Department of Engineering and Technology offers a wide variety of certificate programs and courses including post-baccalaureate credit-bearing (400-level) and continuing education (CEU) credit courses. Course disciplines span engineering and technical management subject areas. UCLA Extension courses and certificate programs offer students the opportunity to learn from highly qualified practitioners who hold advanced degrees and are passionate about teaching and can impart knowledge within their field of expertise.
Job Description

Blockchain Technology Management instructor to teach fully online on a quarterly basis and ongoing. We are looking for professionals who can convey their industry experience and knowledge to our students using actual work examples and applications of topics covered in the courses. Industry experience is preferred.

Several job openings are available in the Blockchain Technology Management program. Qualified applicants possessing current knowledge and teaching experience in the following topic area(s) are encouraged to apply:
• Fundamentals of Blockchain Management
• Blockchain Solutions, Governance, and Collaboration
• Digital Transformation: Blockchain, IoT, AI and Trusted Data
• Blockchain Technology Adoption and Implementation
• Cryptocurrency and Blockchain Business and Applications
Instructor Duties:
• Develop and/or update existing course syllabus in consultation with the UCLA Extension Program Director as assigned using approved syllabus template
• Prepare course materials and learning assessments in Canvas, or update existing ones
• Communicate and teach the course objectives and the specific learning outcomes to students.
• Hold online office hours via Zoom for students to optionally participate to cover course related topics and Q/A
• Weekly and preferably daily interaction with students' discussion posts on Canvas to promote high engagement and collaboration in the online course for an optimum learning experience.
• Review students' progress through the course and assign timely grading
• Respond to student questions and learning needs in a timely manner
General Employment Information

Employment as a UCLA Extension Instructor is dictated by contract terms and conditions. Please take the time to read the UCLA Extension Instructor Employment Policies .

For information on UCLA Extension instructor benefits , please visit Pay, Benefits, & Privileges .

Access, Equity, Diversity, and Inclusion (AEDI) is one of UCLA Extension's guiding principles. We strive to extend access to UCLA, our programs, and services to underrepresented communities and populations, while serving as a model organization for AEDI in the field of continuing higher education. Committed to attracting and retaining diverse staff & instructors, UCLA Extension welcomes your experiences, perspectives, and unique identity. Please visit our website dedicated to our AEDI efforts as an organization: Equity, Diversity, & Inclusion @ UNEX .

To apply, please visit: https://recruit.apo.ucla.edu/JPF08290

The University of California is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, age or protected veteran status. For the complete University of California nondiscrimination and affirmative action policy, see: UC Nondiscrimination & Affirmative Action Policy, https://policy.ucop.edu/doc/4000376/DiscHarassAffirmAction

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Technical Expert
jobs_results.description:
About The Role

Blockchain Technical Expert...

The Innovation team’s mission is to accelerate and de-risk the creation and adoption of new technologies for SWIFT and its customers. Innovative technology combined with great methodologies is the ethos of our team. We are champions of responsible innovation – a key objective for our company. To that accord, one of the key streams of work within our team is around exploring Central Bank Digital Currencies and Tokenised Assets. In this space, SWIFT is actively engaging with central banks, financial institutions, technology providers, and academics to explore the potential of Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs) and how SWIFT can support central banks should they implement digital currencies in the future. As part of this role, you will leverage your technical expertise in digital currencies, distributed ledgers, and blockchain technology to design, scope, and conduct innovation experiments that align with key areas of interest for SWIFT (such as: interoperability between different CBDC networks and existing RTGS payment rails in domestic and cross-border contexts, interlinking between multiple CBDC networks, and tokenisation of securities assets and cash settlement with CBDCs).

Responsibilities 
• Conduct technical consultation sessions with customers and internal stakeholders on innovation initiatives strategy, and market trends to define and scope initiatives in the blockchain space
• Work closely with Solution Architects, Product Owners, and Engineering Leads to evaluate, compare and design optimal solutions that meet business objectives, including conducting detailed assessments for DLT solutions in scope to determine the feasibility of successful implementation and present solutions to senior level and executive audiences, both internal and external.
• Assess the capabilities and limitations of technology vendors, and, where appropriate, evaluate the benefits and drawbacks of DLT or non-DLT, including presenting and communicate complex solutions to technical and non-technical partners in a clear and concise manner to demonstrate how solution designs will enable business needs will enable business needs
• Define application and technical patterns, project deliverables, including rationale for those decisions and architecture solution.
• Lead technical aspects of innovation initiatives (POC’s, experiments, etc.) such as partner evaluations, technology vendor assessments, and alignment with emerging technology trends, business strategy, objectives, and roadmaps.

Qualifications: 

Technical Skills & Core Competencies:
• Experience in enterprise-level DLT architecture, development, design, integration, and implementations of enterprise DLT POCs.
• Hands-on engineering experience designing distributed systems and implementing DLT solutions for financial services or other enterprise applications.
• Working knowledge with frameworks, design patterns, and programing languages such as Java, Python, C/C++, and JavaScript.
• Exceptional communication skills, comfortable presenting complex technical concepts in front of large audiences, both technical and non-technical.
• Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and summarize and present findings to senior-level executives.
• Proven ability and experience working with senior stakeholders and enterprise applications, preferably within the financial services industry.
• Experience with blockchain and DLT technologies with in-depth knowledge of smart contracts, tokenization, consensus mechanisms, frameworks, and standards.
• Ability to guide and contribute to building product strategy, define architecture, processes, and measurements for achieving functional objectives.
• Deep understanding of Hyperledger and Ethereum-based protocols and ecosystem, their relevance to permissioned blockchain architectures and their implications on decentralized applications and being able to reason about different scalability approaches.
• Quality-oriented: You know that production-ready software takes more than just committing code
• Agile mindset: You like to learn and continuously improve the way we work 
• Security mindset: You know that security is always top of mind and are conscious of keeping in line with Security policy  
• Appetite for the business: You like technology and you love to use it to create solutions to help your customers 

 

Professional competencies: 
• Autonomous and driven with strong ability to quickly adapt and respond to change 
• Customer oriented and quality mindset – we continually strive to deliver true customer value 
• Open-minded, solutions oriented, and a true team player who gains energy through collaboration
• Willingness to continuously learn and take ownership of projects and tasks 
• A team player willing to work in a multicultural environment, able to build and maintain working relationships across internal and external organizations and virtual teams 
• Strong verbal and written communication skills in English

Nice to have: 
• Knowledge of enterprise blockchain and existing payment systems and concepts such as correspondent banking, settlement/clearing, RTGS, etc. is a plus
• Experience with and deep understanding of full stack development lifecycle including best practices, code reviews, testing, building UIs, and integrating with databases
• Working knowledge of modern software development practices and technologies such as Agile methodologies, Design Thinking, DevOps, and CI/CD practices.
• Demonstrated ability to independently research technical topics and generate creative and innovative solutions using design thinking, lean and agile frameworks  

Experience:
• 3+ years of experience in a similar capacity requiring strong technical and business understanding 
• See core competencies for relevant experience  

Education: 
• University degree in computer science or related field. Or equivalent work experience

What We Offer

We put you in control of career

We give you a competitive package

We help you perform at your best

We help you make a difference

We give you the freedom to be yourself

We give you the freedom to be yourself. We are creating an environment of unique individuals – like you – with different perspectives on the financial industry and the world. An environment in which everyone’s voice counts and where you can reach your full potential regardless of age, background, culture, colour, disability, gender, nationality, race, religion, sexual orientation, or veteran/military status

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Technical Support (BNB Chain)
jobs_results.description:
Location: Asia

Employment Type: Full-time Onsite or Remote...

Team: IT Helpdesk

Binance is the global blockchain company behind the world’s largest digital asset exchange by trading volume and users, serving a greater mission to accelerate cryptocurrency adoption and increase the freedom of money.

Are you looking to be a part of the most influential company in the blockchain industry and contribute to the crypto-currency revolution that is changing the world?

We are looking for a passionate and experienced Blockchain Technical Operations Specialist Binance Smart Chain(BSC) Eco-system.

BSC is a EVM compatible blockchain and in the past year, BSC has become one of the largest public blockchain with more than 800 DeFi and dApps have been deployed on BSC and attracted more than 1 millions daily active users (addresses) in the peak time.

The successful candidate will join the innovative and fast changing field to build a new era of blockchain.
Job Responsibilities:
• Responsible for investigating and resolving the technical issues timely from external or internal communities on the blockchain products including Wallets, Bridge, Nodes, and more
• High responsibility in continuous improvement in BSC technical documentation, blogs and community forum
• Strong collaboration, communication and interaction with all stakeholders including product manager, engineering and business development team
• Work closely with product and engineering teams globally, participate and follow up in iteration, release and roadmap planning timely
• Very flexible with capability to prioritize multiple tasks and deadlines to facilitate well in a fast-paced, rapidly evolving organization.

Job Requirements:
• Degree in technical discipline
• 2+ years of experience in similar roles - e.g. Technical Support, Community Support
• Background working with mission critical 24/7 systems will be beneficial
• Must have strong capabilities to identify, analyze and resolve problems logically and systematically
• Tech skills: Blockchain, Wallets, Web3.

Working at Binance
• Do something meaningful; Be a part of the future of finance technology and the no.1 company in the industry
• Fast moving, challenging and unique business problems
• International work environment and flat organisation
• Great career development opportunities in a growing company
• Possibility for relocation and international transfers mid-career
• Competitive salary
• Flexible working hours, Casual work attire

jobs_results.title: Software Engineer - Blockchain Security
jobs_results.description:
ZetaChain is the foundational layer to a truly multichain future; the blockchain’s novel approach creates a truly fluid crypto-ecosystem that will enable more users, developers, and traders than ever to onboard, use, and take advantage of the benefits of crypto.

ZetaChain’s blockchain enables multichain functionality without using bridges or wrapped tokens and enables the easy deployment of... omnichain-dApps, or odApps, that can manage and connect data and value across all smart contract platforms as well as non-smart contract platforms like Bitcoin and Dogecoin.

Job Description

This position will join the DevOps/DevSecOps team and primarily be responsible for security automation, monitoring, and response of the protocol. They will also assist with some security administration tasks as needed such as configuring IAM/SSO, audit logging, and monitoring for critical applications.

This position will join the DevOps/DevSecOps team and will focus on security automation, on-chain observability, metrics, and automated security responses for our protocol and web applications. They may assist with additional security administration tasks as needed such as configuring IAM/SSO, audit logging, and monitoring for critical applications.

We are looking for someone who has hands-on development experience in the web3 space and is comfortable moving between Web2 and Web3 technologies.

Our tech stack

Infrastructure: Docker, AWS, Terraform, Ansible, Serverless Protocol: Go (Cosmos SDK, go-ethereum, btcsuite, Tendermint Core) Smart contracts: Solidity, Rust, Hardhat Frontend: Typescript, Next.js, Redux toolkit, Ethers.js, tRPC, GraphQL Others: Yarn3 monorepo, Vercel, GitHub actions

Experience

1+ years of blockchain/Web3 development experience 3+ years of overall development or DevOps experience. Familiar with DevOps/DevSecOps methodologies & best practices. Experience with cyber security or a strong desire to improve that part of your skill set

job_highlights.title: Qualifications
items: We are looking for someone who has hands-on development experience in the web3 space and is comfortable moving between Web2 and Web3 technologies
1+ years of blockchain/Web3 development experience 3+ years of overall development or DevOps experience
Familiar with DevOps/DevSecOps methodologies & best practices
Experience with cyber security or a strong desire to improve that part of your skill set

job_highlights.title: Responsibilities
items: This position will join the DevOps/DevSecOps team and primarily be responsible for security automation, monitoring, and response of the protocol
They will also assist with some security administration tasks as needed such as configuring IAM/SSO, audit logging, and monitoring for critical applications
This position will join the DevOps/DevSecOps team and will focus on security automation, on-chain observability, metrics, and automated security responses for our protocol and web applications

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Engineer
jobs_results.description:
21.co is the world's leader in providing access to crypto through simple and easy to use products. 21.co is the parent company of 21Shares and Amun, and its mission is to build bridges into the crypto world.

21Shares is the world's largest issuer of cryptocurrency exchange traded products (ETPs) and is powered by Onyx, a proprietary technology platform used to issue and operate cryptocurrency... ETPs for 21Shares and third parties. 21Shares mission is to make crypto easy.

Amun is a blockchain infrastructure company focused on making purchasing crypto more accessible by offering a suite of tools for passive strategies across major DeFi platforms. Amun's mission is to simplify your crypto journey.

The company was founded in 2018 by Hany Rashwan and Ophelia Snyder and is a global organization, with offices in Zurich and New York. Cathie Wood, Chief Executive Officer & Chief Investment Officer of ARK Invest is a board member.

We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Blockchain Engineer to join our team and help us design, develop, and implement blockchain-based solutions. As a Blockchain Engineer, you will be responsible for developing smart contracts, designing and implementing blockchain protocols, and collaborating with cross-functional teams. The project will be cutting edge and unique to the crypto industry with exposure to the DeFi space. There will be massive opportunities to learn new technologies and skillsets, as well as the chance to develop, test, and maintain code for our mission-critical products.

Our culture is all about diversity, communication, collaboration and education.

Responsibilities and Scope:
• Design, develop and implement blockchain solutions and smart contracts.
• Writing and delivering quality code.
• Interpret product requirements and provide engineering estimates.
• Create and maintain documentation for all blockchain-related processes, procedures, and guidelines.
• Conduct code reviews and ensure code quality and security.
• Troubleshoot and debug blockchain-based applications and systems.
• Work with stakeholders to identify opportunities to leverage blockchain technology to improve business processes.
• Research and stay up-to-date with the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in blockchain technology.

What You Will Need To Be Great In This Role:
• Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
• A professional understanding of the Ethereum Virtual Machine and its Yellow Paper
• Fluency in Solidity, Typescript, and NodeJS
• Experience with web3 related libraries and API design
• A high level understanding of common cryptographic and smart contract related vulnerabilities
• Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills and/or experience with reverse engineering
• Proficiency with Git
• Must be passionate about working with a growing team in an office environment
• Great written communication skills
• Efficiency in Rust, a plus
• Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and meet tight deadlines

Our Stack:
• EVM Blockchain networks
• Hardhat and Foundry
• AWS infrastructure

Preferred:
• Experience with decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols and applications.
• Contributions to open-source blockchain projects.
• Experience with Solana is a plus.

This role is based in New York City and will be expected to work from our New York office in a hybrid model Monday - Wednesday.

(NYC only) Pursuant to Section 8-102 of title 8 of the New York City administrative code, the base salary range for this role is $170,000.00 - $190,000.00. Total compensation packages are based on a wide array of factors unique to each candidate, including but not limited to skill set, years & depth of experience, certifications and specific office location. This may differ in other locations due to cost of labor considerations

jobs_results.title: Senior Product Manager (Blockchain)
jobs_results.description:
Overview

trac is an artist monetization platform. We provide the virtual infrastructure every artist and their teams need to easily monetize their content, name, and likeness directly with their fans. Our long-term vision is to tokenize the economy around the artist, using smart contracts and the blockchain to help them sell their music, build their brand/community and track their impact more... effectively and efficiently. Learn more about us here: https://trac.co/

We are looking for a Senior Product Manager to join our team at trac to help us build out our web3 offerings to our artists and their fans. You will work closely with customers, engineering, as well as a broad set of internal teams to build blockchain-powered infrastructure that will impact end users around the world.

We look for smart people who can implement well-crafted solutions to complex problems in a fast-paced environment and those who are intrinsically motivated to take ownership of their work.

Responsibilities

As a Senior Product Manager at trac you’ll be responsible for:

● Define vision, strategy and roadmap every quarter, working closely with engineers, designers, analysts, data scientists, researchers

● You will conceive, build and maintain product, platform and tooling features by utilizing blockchain and web3 technologies to deliver on our customers' needs

● Research user problems, stay ahead of market developments in the crypto space, and build relationships with key partners

● Design and deliver crypto products that advance the company's mission

● Drive adoption of crypto-first product features, working closely with various teams across the DeFi ecosystem

Requirements

As a Senior Product Manager at trac, you should:

● Have more than 5 years of product management experience, having evolved product portfolios that have attracted meaningful customer adoption and generated significant revenue

● Have knowledge and understanding of the global cryptocurrency market; familiar with the crypto ecosystem (decentralized finance, NFTs, identity, staking, etc)

● Have previous experience working closely with 3rd parties to implement new technologies and features

● Have previous experience with blockchain, NFTs and/or cryptocurrency

● Have driven product development from discovery to concept to launch

● Have aligned teams and stakeholders on a shared vision tied to larger strategy

● Have orchestrated cross-functional teams of analysts, designers, and engineers

● Have facilitated user research, metrics, and feedback to drive development

● Have experience with all phases of the software development lifecycle and of the problems developers face at each with debugging, observability, monitoring and troubleshooting tools

● Be successful in a fast-paced, collaborative environment

● Be able to work fully remotely

● Experience building a cryptocurrency exchange or wallet is a plus!

● Experience working at a startup is a plus!

● Knowledge of the music industry is a plus!

Diversity is important to our team; if you’re unsure if you might be a fit, please apply

Have more than 5 years of product management experience, having evolved product portfolios that have attracted meaningful customer adoption and generated significant revenue
Have knowledge and understanding of the global cryptocurrency market; familiar with the crypto ecosystem (decentralized finance, NFTs, identity, staking, etc)

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Engineer Intern, CBDC (Summer 2023)
jobs_results.description:
Blockchain Engineer Intern, CBDC

RippleX’s mission is to inspire and enable developers and institutions to collectively build the internet of value (IoV) - which will enable the world to move value like information moves today. We also partner with financial service firms and institutions to develop solutions that use XRP, the XRP Ledger, and related technologies such as our CBDC... Ledger.

Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) is a strategic initiative for Ripple, staffed with an "A Team" of blockchain and financial industry experts. We are looking for an intern to work on a number of projects that will drive up the level of engagement with central banks around the world. Specifically this role will help build prototypes and demonstratabel software solutions that address the needs of central banks and is an opportunity to get exposure in this exciting industry. This intern role will work directly for the VP of Central Bank Engagements.

WHAT YOU’LL DO:
• Design and build prototype software solutions on top of the private Ripple CBDC Ledger (XRPL technology)
• Work with CBDC Delivery and Business Development teams to translate central bank needs into software specifications
• Help reply to requests for proposals by answering deep technical questions
• Provide input and perspective on the role of CBDC and stable coins in the financial system
• Demonstrate the solutions built to internal stakeholders
• Create videos of software demonstrations

WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR:
• Currently enrolled in an undergraduate or graduate computer science program
• Proficient in at least one common programming language such as Java, Python, Javascript, Rust, C++, etc
• Driven individual with a track record of participating in hackathons and/or software development projects
• Understanding of the technology and structure of stablecoins and/or CBDCs
• Technical knowledge of crypto currencies
• Experience or exposure working with blockchain solutions
• Bonus:
• Experience creating smart contracts with common frameworks such as Solidity
• Experience using XRPL libraries such as xrpl.js, xrpl-py, and xrpl4j

WHAT WE OFFER INTERNS:

We’re looking to increase what we already offer, but you can expect
• * Competitive regional hourly pay
• 1:1 Mentoring
• Dedicated "buddy"- we'll partner you with someone at Ripple who will act as friend, advocate, liason, guide and so much more!
• Social and professional development events (In-person and virtual)
• Ripple offers lunches twice a week for non-remote employees
• On that note, Ripple has a very flexible remote policy - You get the choice of where you work from.
• The chance to work in a fast-paced start-up environment with experienced industry leaders
• A learning environment where you can dive deep into the latest technologies and make an impact
• Weekly company meeting - ask me anything style discussion with our Leadership Team
• Design laptop, software and headphones (on loan)

#LI-DNI

Ripple focuses on Internet, Enterprise Software, Financial Services, Payments, and Banking. Their company has offices in New York City, San Francisco, Dubai, Singapore, and Washington DC. They have a large team that's between 501-1000 employees. To date, Ripple has raised $290.7M of funding; their latest round was closed on December 2019.

You can view their website at http://ripple.com or find them on Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Product Hunt

items: Currently enrolled in an undergraduate or graduate computer science program
Proficient in at least one common programming language such as Java, Python, Javascript, Rust, C++, etc
Driven individual with a track record of participating in hackathons and/or software development projects
Understanding of the technology and structure of stablecoins and/or CBDCs
Technical knowledge of crypto currencies
Experience or exposure working with blockchain solutions
Experience creating smart contracts with common frameworks such as Solidity
Experience using XRPL libraries such as xrpl.js, xrpl-py, and xrpl4j

items: Specifically this role will help build prototypes and demonstratabel software solutions that address the needs of central banks and is an opportunity to get exposure in this exciting industry
Design and build prototype software solutions on top of the private Ripple CBDC Ledger (XRPL technology)
Work with CBDC Delivery and Business Development teams to translate central bank needs into software specifications
Help reply to requests for proposals by answering deep technical questions
Provide input and perspective on the role of CBDC and stable coins in the financial system
Demonstrate the solutions built to internal stakeholders
Create videos of software demonstrations

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Resource 1 is seeking a Blockchain Engineer for a 6-month hybrid contract for our client in the Chicagoland area. Individual should have at least 2 years of experience as a blockchain engineer.

Responsibilities...
• Collaborate with managers to determine blockchain technology needs and envisaged functionalities.
• Create application features and interfaces by using programming languages and writing multithreaded codes.
• Apply the latest cryptology techniques to protect digital transaction data against cyberattacks and information hacks.
• Maintain client and server-side applications.
• Optimize and secure blockchain applications by integrating new tools and technologies.
• Document blockchain development processes and comply with best practices in data protection.
• Keep up with current blockchain technologies and cryptography methods.

Qualifications:
• 2+ years of experience as a blockchain developer.
• Advanced proficiency in programming languages, such as C++, Java, and Python.
• Extensive experience in back-end development, algorithms, and data structures.
• Knowledge of cryptography and blockchain protocols.
• In-depth knowledge of best practices in blockchain management and data protection.
• Advanced analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Superb organizational skills and keen attention to detail
